mapper.select: SELECT meet_id ,meet_id AS id ,meet_se ,meet_title ,meet_title AS title ,meet_cn ,CONCAT(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(MEET_DATE, '%Y%m%d'),'T'), DATE_FORMAT(MEET_DATE, '%H%i')) AS "start" ,meet_loc FROM tbl_meet WHERE use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY meet_date

SELECT user_uid ,user_id ,user_pw ,user_name ,user_gender ,user_birth ,user_depart ,user_posi ,addr_post ,user_addrs ,user_phone ,user_tele ,user_email ,user_auth FROM tbl_user WHERE 1=1 AND user_name LIKE CONCAT(#{userName},'%') ORDER BY user_name

SELECT cust_uid ,cust_name ,cust_gender ,cust_birth ,cust_addr ,addr_post ,cust_email ,phone_number ,company_name ,pos_code ,dept_code ,attached_cnt ,create_date FROM tbl_customer WHERE 1=1 AND cust_name LIKE CONCAT(#{custName},'%') ORDER BY cust_name

SELECT ur.user_uid ,ur.user_name FROM tbl_user ur INNER JOIN tbl_meet_join mj ON ur.user_uid = mj.meet_user_id WHERE 1=1 AND mj.use_yn = 'Y' AND mj.meet_id = #{meetId} AND mj.meet_user_se = 'SE01' ORDER BY user_name

SELECT cr.cust_uid ,cr.cust_name FROM tbl_customer cr INNER JOIN tbl_meet_join mj ON cr.cust_uid = mj.meet_user_id WHERE 1=1 AND mj.use_yn = 'Y' AND mj.meet_id = #{meetId} AND mj.meet_user_se = 'SE02' ORDER BY cust_name

SELECT meet_id ,meet_se ,meet_title ,meet_cn ,meet_date ,DATE_FORMAT(MEET_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS meet_date_ymd ,DATE_FORMAT(MEET_DATE, '%H%i%s') as meet_date_his ,meet_loc FROM tbl_meet WHERE 1=1 AND use_yn = 'Y' AND meet_id = #{meetId}
